name: Reaping Granny
description:
A tiny game about helping Death reaping a granny.

This game was made during the Epic Megajam 2020 which had for theme "It's been a while but we're not done yet".

Gameplay
Find the granny among many innocent people and try to reap her. 

Controls
Gamepad
Move : Left Stick / ASWD
Attack : Triggers or A button / Spacebar
Skip Dialogue : B button / Enter or B key
